title: Fed Governor Questions Need for US Central Bank Digital Currency
description: A top Federal Reserve official said Tuesday she has yet to be convinced there is a need for the U.S. central bank to develop a digital currency. Fed Governor Remains Unconvinced on U.S. CBDC, Cites Existing Innovations and Risks In a discourse at Harvard Law School, Fed Governor Michelle Bowman articulated that the case for […]

title: Five Eyes Intelligence Chiefs Unite to Accuse China of Intellectual Property Theft and AI-Driven Espionage
description: In an unprecedented move, intelligence chiefs from the Five Eyes countries, which include the United States, Britain, Canada, Australia, and New Zealand, have jointly accused China of engaging in intellectual property theft and utilizing artificial intelligence for hacking and spying activities. The accusations, made following meetings with private companies in Silicon Valley, highlight growing concerns ... Read more

title: Proposed Swedish Surveillance Expansion Targets Gang Violence Epidemic
description: In a determined effort to combat the escalating issue of gang violence plaguing the country, the Swedish government has unveiled a bold plan to significantly expand its surveillance capabilities. title: $4,300,000,000,000 Asset Manager Fidelity Updates Bitcoin ETF Filing to Join BlackRock, Ark Invest and Invesco with the SEC
description: Fidelity’s recent amendment to its Bitcoin ETF application hints at a pivotal shift in blending traditional finance with digital currencies. SEC’s response could make or break the much-anticipated mainstream adoption of cryptocurrency by institutional investors. Fidelity Joins Elite Ranks in Bitcoin ETF Quest Following the lead of Ark Invest and Invesco, Fidelity Funds Management LLC [...]
